Module kivakit.serialization.gson
Package com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson.serializers

Class StringConverterGsonSerializer<Value>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson.serializers.StringConverterGsonSerializer<Value>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Value>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<Value>, JsonSerializerDeserializer<Value>
public class StringConverterGsonSerializer<Value> extends Object implements JsonSerializerDeserializer<Value>
An adapter that converts a StringConverter into a JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer by using the Converter.convert(Object) and TwoWayConverter.unconvert(Object) methods to serialize and deserialize strings.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
